levels.levelDescription: As you step into the realm of 'Whispers of the Umbral Abyss,' the ground beneath you is covered in eerie dark-grass, shrouded in shadows. Beware the deep-dark-holes that threaten to swallow you whole, whispering secrets of the abyss.

The 'Ruins of the Lost Empire' are a maze of rusty-chain-platforms suspended above mysterious waters. Ancient ruins and remnants of a forgotten civilization loom in the distance, the sound of water echoing through the desolate halls.

In the heart of darkness lies 'Void's Embrace,' a realm of fractured-wall-platforms floating above rivers of molten lava. The air is thick with the scent of sulfur, and the distant roar of the inferno serves as a reminder of the legendary Ethereal Void Stalker, Nethergeist, who awaits at the end of this treacherous path.
